nodes.text: The Superheavy Composite Beam Turbolaser was a model of turbolaser that was supposedly powered by kyber crystals and considered by the Rebel Alliance to be a superweapon. Each Onager-class Star Destroyer could be outfitted with a pair of these turbolasers which could be used in long-range attacks on starships, although they had a shorter range than Orbital Bombardment Particle Cannons.
